Title: Twelve Blue
Author: Michanel
one_sentence_description: Twelve Blue is an HTML hypertext that makes use of frames and image-maps. The work tells a complex and enigmatic story of memory, desire, lust, truth, and consequences.

Title: Deviant: The Possession of Christian Shaw
Author: Donna Leishman
one_sentence_description: This project explores new ways of experiencing a story — harnessing the allure of mystery and uneasy tensions and plucking the participant's sense of social responsibility.

Title: Façade
Author: Michanel Mateas & Andrew Stern
one_sentence_description: It is the creation of an interactive, animated fiction that can accept any type of language produced by the user and assimilate it into the outcome of the narrative.

Title: Still Standing
Author: Druno Nadeau & Jason Lewis
one_sentence_description: <Still Standing >invites participants to use their bodies as reading instruments.  The viewer must remain perfectly still, her stillness causing the video-projected text to assemble as if attracted to a magnet.

Title: sooth
Author: David Jhave Johnston
one_sentence_description: <Sooth> is one of a growing number of works that seek to integrate algorithmically animated, interactive text with rich video imagery. It leads the viewer/user into a compelling meditation on the body, the soul, the subconscious and the desires and fears that plague it.

Title: separation
Author: Annie Abrahams
one_sentence_description: <Separation> is an interactive piece that reflects some of the physical and psychic disorders that result from intensive use of a computer.

Title: synonymovie
Author: Eugenio Tisselli
one_sentence_description: <synonymovie> emerges from the translation from a word to an image that "means" or evokes the same.The "movie" will end when a word without synonyms (or related images) is found.

Title: V: Vniverse
Author: Stephanie Strickland & Cynthia Lanwson Jaramillo
one_sentence_description: V is a 3-part poem that explores a weave of ways to cast and map text. The play-read process in the poem is an iterative one. Iterated returns overwhelm individual differences in sampling.

Title: hobo lobo of hamelin
Author: Stevan Živadinović
one_sentence_description: Hobo Lobo of Hamelin is a digital pop-up book about a city, its scruples, some rats, a wolf, his woodwind and the stuff that goes down.

Title: dead tower
Author: Andy campbell & Mez Brreeze
one_sentence_description: Set in a dark and abstract dream world that revolves around a crashed bus, the atmospheric literary game environment The Dead Tower can be freely explored at full-screen with the mouse and keyboard.

Title: Distance
Author: La Porta, Tina
one_sentence_description: Distance explores our desire for communication, through connection and disconnection, via fluctuations in transmission and reception between geographically separated participants mediated by the surface of the screen.

Title: Brainstrips
Author: Bigelow,Alan
one_sentence_description: The three works that make up Brainstrips are intricately designed visual and audio experiences, often using assets culled from the internet.

Title: Alice in the Wonderbalcony
Author: Pinto,Regina Celia
one_sentence_description: "Alice in the 'Wonderbalcony'" is a surreal work of commentary on net art and performance that is alive with stunning deployments of color and movement.

Title: ))breathe((
Author: Knoebel,David
one_sentence_description: ))breathe(( is a hypermedia poem with a minimalist interface that captures a moment in time. Users navigate a series of rectangular shapes and lines that come and go, and this navigation prompts poetic phrases that flash on the screen.

Title: sea and spar between
Author: Nick Montfort and Stephanie Strickland
one_sentence_description: Sea and Spar Between is a poetry generator which defines a space of language populated by a number of stanzas comparable to the number of fish in the sea, around 225 trillion.
